markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Soothing Mist](/Feats.aspx?ID=1769) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
warden spells

</column>

---

You have a connection to the healing properties of nature and can produce a magical mist to heal damage and stop burning or bleeding. You gain the [_soothing mist_](/Spells.aspx?ID=777) warden spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Soothing Mist
